title: Was Chappelle’s Special THAT Special?
itunes:author: Andrew Schulz's Flagrant with Akaash Singh
itunes:summary:
This week Andrew Schulz, Akaash Singh, AlexxMedia and Mark Gagnon discuss if the NBA players should sit out for BLM, was Chappelle's special that special, the first Black Bachelor and how racist the fans of The Bachelor are, if we would go to a Trump rally, does yoga cause rape and much more. INDULGE!

Want an extra episode a week? Join the Flagrant Army
www.Patreon.com/FLAGRANT2
